insert into t_project_product (id, time, name, apr, agreement_url_1, agreement_url_2, agreement_url_3, deadline, description, flow_img, is_use, agreement_url_1_format, agreement_url_2_format, agreement_url_3_format, income_type, basic_apr) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agreementUrl1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agreementUrl2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agreementUrl3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deadline,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUse,jdbcType=BIT}, #{agreementUrl1Format,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agreementUrl2Format,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agreementUrl3Format,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{basicApr,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update t_project_product set time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apr = #{apr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agreement_url_1 = #{agreementUrl1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agreement_url_2 = #{agreementUrl2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agreement_url_3 = #{agreementUrl3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deadline = #{deadline,jdbcType=TINYINT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_img = #{flowImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=BIT}, agreement_url_1_format = #{agreementUrl1Format,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agreement_url_2_format = #{agreementUrl2Format,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agreement_url_3_format = #{agreementUrl3Format,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, income_type = #{incomeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, basic_apr = #{basicApr,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, time, name, apr, agreement_url_1, agreement_url_2, agreement_url_3, deadline, description, flow_img, is_use, agreement_url_1_format, agreement_url_2_format, agreement_url_3_format, income_type, basic_apr from t_project_product where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
